XII.ii.3.B.4.a
.
Notifying Claimants of REPS Disallowance
If the Veteran’s death is nonqualifying, the St. Louis RO
disallows the claim, and
notifies the claimant of the specific reason for the administrative denial.
Note
:  Existing VA review rights will apply for these cases.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section B - Handling Claims for Restored Entitlement Program for Survivors (REPS) Benefits
